x_axis_lum_diff = [50, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100]

luminance difference applied | faults detected
------------------------------------------------
                        50   |   25
                        60   |   30
                        70   |   30
                        80   |   30
                        90   |   34
                        100  |   33

lum_diff_error is a 2D array, where lum_diff_error[i] is a list of error results for a specific applied luminance difference. 
i = 0 corresponds to 50, i = 1 corresponds to 60, ..., i = 5 corresponds to 100
